Hey, I'm Zinzy Waleson, a person online and in Amsterdam. This here is a quiet street of the Internet where I come to link and think. I'm a researcher and designer making tools for people at work. Learn more about me, this website or what I'm up to now, say hello, or visit the archive.

Colophon

This is a personal website, designed, built, and maintained by yours truly. In nature, it is casual, unpretentious, and unassuming. On here, youâ€™ll find soft stances, lived experiences, and critical notes on the things I hold dear. Itâ€™s organized as a casual collection of unfinished thoughts.

Technical details

  • This website is built in Jekyll, a flat-file content management system Iâ€™ve been using for years. I like my familiarity with the platform, as well as the light-weight nature of flat-file systems.
  • Iâ€™ve taken Maxime Vaillancourt digital garden template for Jekyll as my starting point. I continue to change it on an almost daily basis.
  • The font youâ€™re looking at is whatever is native to your operating system.

Setup

  • This website lacks an archive or central index. Instead, itâ€™s a collection of linked files. I like that this is essentially a scavenger hunt.

IndieWeb

I use this website to participate in the IndieWeb, a great community of people who enjoy tinkering on personal websites, as well as independence while they do so.
